rows.label: tlk70000070_04_msg0001
rows.name:
You know, we hear rumors about you
folks even way out here in the boonies.

rows.label: tlk70000070_04_msg0002
rows.name:
I may look like a simple farmer, but I'm
an adventurer at heart. I even know
a little bit about combat.

rows.label: tlk70000070_04_msg0003
rows.name:
I knew enough to pick up on the fact
that you folks weren't run-of-the-mill
travelers, anyway.

rows.label: tlk70000070_04_msg0004
rows.name:
And I've got enough wiles to see that
you're not just getting by on pure
strength, either.

rows.label: tlk70000070_04_msg0005
rows.name:
Any fighter who has the compassion
to come all the way out here and chat
is special in my books.

rows.label: tlk70000070_04_msg0006
rows.name:
You inspire us, y'know? I know it's not
the same, but I want to keep working
hard, just like you folks.
